author: Stuflagrl
title: Secind stay here didn't disappoint.
text: Love this hotel, great location and having a kitchen is so convenient. Subway station is close, easy subway ride to Yankee stadium. We stayed in a corner room with king bed and pull-out sofa. Perfect size for 3 people. I won't stay anywhere else in New York from now on. Perfect little gym for a quick workout. Love it!!
